value.title: We mustn’t let ethical questionson AI get lost in all the euphoria
value.excerpt: Our planet is already on the edge with climate change, and these models could only accelerate that trend. The cloud and these AI models running on it take huge amounts of energy. For instance, training a transformer model just once with 213 million parameters can spew out the same carbon emissions that 125 New York-Beijing round flight trips would,
